txt.en: You should visit and be seen at the various market areas and tavern in Dale, salute merchants, congratulate happy shoppers, assist indecisive shoppers, and calm angry shoppers on the way.

'[placeholder] - do I have that right? The - hhhem! - merchants of Dale have watched you in your service to Dale, and we have noted the good impression you have made on the folk of Dale.\n\n'Indeed, the impression was strong enough that we feel your very presence in Dale's markets would do much for commerce. In fact - hhem! - if it were not too much of an imposition... might we ask you to go about Dale's markets, salute some merchants, talk to those buying here and there?'

'[placeholder]! I have already heard many reports of your presence in the markets and the kind and wise words you spared for merchants and shoppers alike.\n\n'You will truly always be welcome here in Dale!'
'I don't mean to be unreasonable. I - I will lower my voice, now.'
'I don't know what came over me. I get so worked up, sometimes!'
DNT return to the mercantile advisor
'I will calm down, but I will do my shopping elsewhere!'
'Oh yes, have a look. Isn't it lovely?'
'I could spend all day in the markets, couldn't you?'
'Why thank you. You are too kind.'
You should return to Rótha, who can be found inside the Great-keep in Dale.
The merchants of Dale believe your presence in the markets will be good for business.

'If it would not be too much trouble, the merchants of Dale would - hhem! - greatly appreciate your making an appearance in the upper markets, the lower markets, and the Jolly Bell tavern. Also, be sure to stop to speak with and encourage some merchants and shoppers along the way.'
'Of course. That is what I should buy!'
'True, true. Mustn't waste time on one purchase, must I?'
'Yes, I'm afraid I got a bit overwhelmed there.'
